name: Escape The Dungeons (Demo)
description:
Escape the Dungeons is an old-school point-and-click game. With simple yet charming artwork, intuitive puzzles, and many hidden secrets to uncover, Escape the Dungeons aims to test your problem-solving skills while maintaining a fantastical and interesting world. 

If you enjoyed this free demo, feel free to support me on Kickstarter!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/escapethedungeon/escape-the-dungeons?ref=di...

----STORY----

In the full release there will be an over-arching, linear story where each level is a continuation of the previous. You play as someone from unknown origins who woke up in a cell. You have no idea where you are or what is going on, but you know you need to escape. 

Traverse your way through each level, solve all of the puzzles, and uncover all of the treasure. Your goal is to escape this land's dungeons and sail away to continue your adventure...will you accomplish it?

----DEMO ACCESS LEVEL INFORMATION----

This level demo includes the following:

  • 1 completed level, "The Catacombs",  with multiple endings
  • Secrets, mystery, and monsters
  • Randomly generated aspects
  • Original music (subject to change)

If you enjoyed this free demo, feel free to support me on Kickstarter!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/escapethedungeon/escape-the-dungeons?ref=di...
